changes: Core Updates:\n- added game version footer to menu and play mode scenes\n- improved preload flow so defence/monster data is initialised better across the board

Combat and Behavior:
- fixed skirmisher edge case where 2-step skirmishers could move into valid range but fail to attack in the same turn.
- fixed revive cleanup edge cases so max-revive units are removed consistently when they finally die
- improved temporary-unit expiry handling and history logging consistency during combat
Visual and Data Pipeline:\n- improved explosion and dice sprite rendering so it doesn't feel clunky\n- added dedicated unit-expired history logging for temporary units
Loadout and UX:\n- added a loadout completeness check before starting a match\n- added loadout shuffle, readiness status, and incomplete-category indicators in local/online loadout menus

Architecture:\n- improved manager architecture to stabilise everything across the board\n- refactored achievements to a shared definition-driven structure (manager + scene) to reduce hardcoded UI data

Unit Balance:
- Lazor Beam: laser beam switched from extension 4 -> full-row travel
- Cryo Fan: laser beam switched from full-row -> extension 4
- Shock Launcher: reload delay 3 -> 4
- Machine Gun: damage 8 -> 9
- Zombie: damage 14 -> 6, ammo 1 -> 2, max revives 2 -> 3
- Skeleton: health 25 -> 27.5
- Electro Mage: health 25 -> 27.5

Quality of Life:
- added projectiles during the combat loop
- added sound effects across different effects
- improved sprite initialization and framework usage across the game
- added challenge-scene loadout visibility for both players
- added hotkeys (Spacebar/R, T) for rolling dice and ending turns

Unit Balance:
- Ghost: now has a 10-wave lifespan instead of being permanent until defeated
- Bat: can fly over allied monsters when pathing allows it
- Harpy: can fly over allied monsters when pathing allows it
Minor Changes:\n- improved combat loop so monsters are less likely to get stuck behind allies\n- improved skirmisher behavior

Bug Fixes:
- fixed force field edge cases that disrupted monster movement
- fixed an issue where Damage Amplifier behavior did not apply correctly.
- minor stability and polish fixes
